commit.message:
Rollup merge of #101161 - ldm0:ldm_fix_diagnostic, r=cjgillot

Fix uintended diagnostic caused by `drain(..)`

Calling `drain(..)` makes later `suggestable_variants.is_empty()` always true, which makes the diagnostics unintended.

verification.payload:
tree 188cc7fa264f8cb3dc98abb0ffd55e07d50a8a11
parent ba0011cbfb5aa8b7a57fa7534a5eee2f0c42ecc0
parent 3f66efde759e396e02e4a1cdadb3b178884e3bbc
author Matthias Krüger <matthias.krueger@famsik.de> 1661974212 +0200
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1661974212 +0200

Rollup merge of #101161 - ldm0:ldm_fix_diagnostic, r=cjgillot

Fix uintended diagnostic caused by `drain(..)`

Calling `drain(..)` makes later `suggestable_variants.is_empty()` always true, which makes the diagnostics unintended.
